# Tender Announcement

## Title
Harrow - Fire Access Roadway Paving Project

## Project Reference
PW-22-01008335

## Tender Notice Details
* Tender ID: 01B46-2022-106
* Publication Date: 2022-09-27
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2022-10-14T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2022-10-10

## Contract Information
* Contracting Authority: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0C5, Canada
* Contract Officer: Jean-François Lemay
* Procurement Officer Email: jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca
* Procurement Officer Phone: 343-571-6196

## Project Description
The project entails the general construction of the Fire Access Roadway located at the Harrow Research and Development Centre in Harrow, Ontario. The scope of work requires the paving of the access road.

## Mandatory Site Visit
A site visit will take place on Tuesday, October 4, 2022 at 10:30 AM Local Standard Time. Interested bidders are required to meet at the Harrow Research and Development Centre (2585 County Road 20, Harrow, Ontario) Main Reception at the centre.

## Tender Requirements
Tenders for the project must be submitted electronically through the BuyandSell service provider’s platform. Bidders are required to obtain related specifications, plans, and drawings, and other tender documents through the platform. Addenda, when issued, will be available on the same platform.

## Evaluation and Award Criteria
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part without prior negotiation and reject any or all proposals received.

## Notice URL and Attachments
The tender notice can be accessed at [URL]. Additional documents, including addenda and question and answer responses, are available at [URL].

## Contact Information
For information related to this tender process, please contact Jean-François Lemay at jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca. All inquiries must be directed in writing to the Contract Officer. Bidders must not contact anyone other than the Contract Officer for information purposes.
